code:
---
config:
  layout: elk
---
stateDiagram
  direction TB
    [*] --> Init
    
    Init --> RotateToBall:find own, ball, and opponent blobs

    RotateToTarget --> RotateToBall: is close to target
    RotateToTarget --> MovetoTarget: is facing target but not close
    RotateToTarget --> RotateToTarget: not facing target yet


    MovetoTarget --> RotateToBall: is close to target
    MovetoTarget --> RotateToTarget: not facing target anymore
    MovetoTarget --> MovetoTarget: not yet at target
    MovetoTarget --> RotateToTarget: lost ball or self


    RotateToBall --> MovetoBall:facing ball
    RotateToBall --> RotateToBall:still turning
    RotateToBall --> RotateToTarget: lost ball or self

    MovetoBall --> RotateToBall: not facing ball anymore
    MovetoBall --> Kick: close to the ball
    MovetoBall --> MovetoBall: not close to the ball yet
    MovetoBall --> RotateToTarget: lost ball or self

    Kick --> Done: finished kick

    Done --> [*]


    Init:Initial setup (100)
    RotateToTarget:Rotate towards target (101)
    MovetoTarget: Move towards target(102)
    RotateToBall: Rotate to ball (103)
    MovetoBall: Move to ball (104)
    Kick:Kick (105)
    Done:Done (199)
